name: Minseok Kwon
content: Minseok Kwon's Home Page Minseok Kwon Professor and Associate Chair Department of Computer Science Rochester Institute of Technology Rochester, NY 14623 Phone: +1 (585) 475-4524 E-mail: jmk (at) cs.rit.edu I am a Professor and Associate Chair in the Department of Computer Science at the Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT). I am also a member of the RIT Center for Cybersecurity. I completed my Ph.D. and M.S. in Computer Science at Purdue University, and obtained my B.S. in Computer Science and Statistics from Seoul National University in Seoul, Korea. Research Interests Network systems and protocols Programmable networks P4 software testing Software-Defined Networking (SDN) In-network security Machine Learning Systems ML workload prediction Publications Teaching CSCI 788. Computer Science MS Projects, MWF 9-9:50am Professional Service Technical Committee, Computer Communications Journal Technical Program Committee: IEEE HPCC 2021, IEEE GC NGNI 2013-21, IEEE ICC NGN 2011-2021, IEEE ISCC 2017, IEEE ICNP 2010, NPSec (2009, 2006), IEEE ICCCN (2006-2009, 2015), IEEE BroadNets 2007, IEEE INFOCOM 2007 Publicity Chair: ICNP 2008 and NPSec 2005
